DOC.brief_summary: The long regulation protocol widely use vitro fertilization cycle , assess regard efficacy , poor responder female undergo vitro fertilization cycle , alone addition growth hormone .
DOC.criteria: Poor responder female posses two three criterion : Female age ≥40 year Females least one previous cancel IVF cycle POR accord AFC ≤ 5 low AMH value .
